cause.description:
buy me drink and here me rant about my catholic up bringing. the dangers of the worlds religions and any kind of spiritalism. the more alcahol you hear me the louder i get.
i may do themed nights...
beer and christianity. wine and Islam. stout and pagans. whiskey and mediums (dont get me started on those cunts)
this will happen most nights in any of the lovely drinking establishments in Kensal Rise.
1. end of all religions
2. living by truth and science
3. cheaper drinks in Kensal Rise
cause.mission: get joel drunk. hear him rant.
cause.name: ranting london atheist
